transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan sir, mai Bhanu baat kar raha hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Haan sir aawaz aa rahi hai meri aapko clear?
Customer: Haan aawaz aa rahi hai.
Executive: Haan mai sir aapko ek video meeting ka link share karu aapke WhatsApp par? To taki ye rahega aap us video meeting ko join karke phir jab apni screen share karenge to mujhe bhi dikh payega sir aap sari cheeze mere mutabik kar rahe hai nahi kar rahe hai.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: To aap link bhejiye.
Customer: Koi aur bhi connect hoga?
Executive: Haan aap line pe rahe sir mai aapko video meeting ka link share karta hu.
Executive: Ek baar sir mujhe apna number bata sakte hai aap?
Customer: Kya thi?
Executive: Pura number bata sakte hai, pura number bata sakte hai sir aapka pura number kya hai?
Customer: 9667305103.
Executive: 96673 05103.
Executive: 05 102.
Executive: 102, 303. Ek minute sir ek minute aap line pe rahiye ek second.

Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan ji sir dekhiye ek baar aapko na maine aapke WhatsApp number par video meeting ka link share kiya hai.
Customer: Hello sir.
Customer: Aap na apne laptop ke through isko join kijiye kyuki aap laptop me chahte hai na sir login karna.
Customer: Ji sir bilkul laptop me mai login kar diya hu.
Customer: Mai abhi laptop me hi connect karta hu, isse join ho raha hu abhi.
Customer: Dekhiye wo ek ek kariye.
Executive: Ji sir aapne video meeting join kar liya hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir to yaha se dikhta hai sir.
Executive: Haan ye sir abhi aapne laptop se join kara hai na?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji thik hai. To sir aap kya kare ek baar mujhe apni screen share kare.
Customer: Nahi mai chahta hu mujhe kuch idea nahi hai sir to aap mujhe khud cheeze khud hi.
Executive: Mai aapko mai aapko guide karta hu.
Executive: Mai aapko guide karta hu kaise screen share kar sakte hai. Abhi na aapko ek arrow ka sign bana aa raha hai sir arrow ka sign dikh raha hai?
Customer: Nahi mai chahta hu.
Executive: Ek teer hogi sir upar ki taraf.
Executive: Ek teer teer hogi teer ka nishan hoga upar ki taraf sir.
Customer: Ji mai aap chahte hai ki mai screen share karu na?
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Thik hai. Maine thik hai aise bataiye.
Executive: Thik hai. Aap sir.
Customer: Haan mujhe sir aapki screen dikh rahi hai aap sir chahte the ki ek to aap chahte the apne kuch product ko update karna ek aap chahte the sir apna competition dekhna.
Customer: Nahi pehle mai starting se suniye meri baat. Ye IndiaMART ka maine account open kar liya hai. Ye account optimize aapke side se pehle kiya gaya tha? Ye sara detail account kiya hai?
Executive: Ji sir sara jo detail hai ye automatically hamari jo team hoti hai isko fill karke rakhti hai. Jo bhi aapki details hai na isme aapne document share kare honge hame apna GST number.
Customer: Hmm ji.
Executive: Aapka bank account details. To ye sari details humne yaha par fill out kari hai ye backend department karta hai.
Customer: Backend department. Sir panch saal se mera account hai aapke paas sara detail mere paas lekin sara detail to full fill yaha pe hua nahi hai dekhiye company ka logo hoga kuch bhi aap dekhte hai na profile picture aayega. Aadhar number bahut sara cheeze to isme profile me optimize hai hi nahi.
Executive: Haan to agar aap sir ye sari cheeze chahte hai isme add karna jaise Aadhar, udhyam number, PAN, import export code to sir aap yaha se inko add kar sakte hai kyuki sir ye confidential details hai. Hai na?
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai to isme TrustSeal add nahi hai.
Customer: Product profile ka logo aapke property tha product and services.
Executive: Product sir aap chahte hai product ko add karna?
Customer: Product haan product and service jo hai me.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: To kuch add nahi hai isme isiliye mujhe lag raha hai ki mera profile kahi pe matlab visible nahi ho raha hai jyada.
Executive: Sir jo abhi aapne buylead par apna mouse ka cursor rakha hua hai uske niche aaye wo products pe.
Customer: Niche sir niche. Thoda aur niche sir jo pehle kar rahe the wo bataiye ki jaise aapne bata rahe the ki RCC core cutting. Ye hai na upar mai isko search kar raha hu ek baar Gurgaon location pe aap kar rahe the ki first position pe mai aa raha hu.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Customer: Ab dikhaiye yaha pe hamari company ka kaha pe kahi dikh raha hai aapko?
Executive: Sir ye jo aap search kar rahe ho na ye buylead hai. Wo right me left hand me likh raha hai sir buylead.
Customer: Okay buylead. Aur man lijiye.
Executive: Haan ye buylead hai sir.
Customer: Agar man lijiye ko aake search karna hai core cutting company koi bhi. Tab iske liye to hum kaha se ye list generate kis pe karenge?
Executive: Company.
Customer: Company. Upar aa raha hai na sir. Haan company pe click kijiye.
Customer: Thik hai isko search karte hai.
Customer: To mai dekh raha hu ki aapke laptop me kyu alag dikha raha hai mere me kyu nahi dikha raha hai kyuki ek de mahine se kahi se dikh hi nahi raha hai mera profile kahi pe.
Customer: Ye dekhiye sir.
Customer: Kaha pe? Ye?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to update products and see competition.

- Account details not fully optimized.

- Profile not visible.



Resolution:

- Executive shared a video meeting link.

- Executive guided how to share screen.

- Executive explained how to add confidential details.

- Executive clarified the difference between buylead and company.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- profile, buylead, products, screen share, optimization
